import React from "react" import "./style.css" const Cart = ({ CartItem, addToCart, decreaseQty }) => { // Calculate total of items const totalPrice = CartItem.reduce((price, item) => price + item.qty * item.price, 0) // Product qty total return ( <>
{/* Display message if cart is empty */}
{CartItem.length === 0 &&

No Items are added in the Cart

} {/* Display cart items */} {CartItem.map((item) => { const productQty = item.price * item.qty return (

{item.name}

Rp.{item.price} * {item.qty} Rp.{productQty}

{/* Increase or decrease product qty */}
) })}

Cart Summary

Total Price :

Rp.{totalPrice}

) } export default Cart
